title: Data processing for Frequency-sweep force volume AFM-IR
description:
First release of the streamlit app to process the data cube obtained by the Force-Volume IR acquisition mode of the IconIR (Bruker). Made by the AFM-IR team of Institut de Chimie Physique of Paris-Saclay University.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/CarlaC08/Force-Volume-IR-processing/commits/AFM-IR

contributors.title: COLLANGE, Carla
contributors.organization: Institut de Chimie Physique, Université Paris-Saclay - CNRS, 91400 Orsay, France
